author: Andy Sidari
comment: I always seem to come back to this one. Excellent ambient mode in green.
title: My "go to" watch face for the G WATCH R

author: Emmanuel Cruz
comment: Notice it drains the watch battery fast. like the design.

reply.author: Jeff Rebeiro
reply.content: There is nothing about the design itself which would specifically drain the battery. If Face for Wear is draining the battery you should file a bug with the developers of that application. I'd appreciate if you modified your review to accommodate the fact that I don't write the application which makes the theme run.

title: nice design but...

author: steve smith
comment: Love the look and added to my collection.
title: Supporting the developers.
